GSD.description:
rtl818x: Prevent using not initialized queues

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.4.198 by commit b8ce58ab80faaea015c206382041ff3bcf5495ff. For more details please see the references link.
